titleInfo.title: Harmonic generation by scattering circularly polarized light of arbitrary intensity from free electrons of arbitrary initial velocity

name.namePart: AG Theoretische Atom-, Molekül- und Laserphysik

mods.abstract: We derive a general analytic expression for the harmonic power generated per unit solid angle as a result of scattering plane-wave, circularly polarized light of arbitrary intensity from free electrons moving initially with arbitrary velocity. The relativistic derivation is carried out fully in the laboratory frame.
